definition: this past year/over the last years
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Twelve months' non-stop football is doing me well. I feel that I am still growing in form.
sentences.chinese: 這是我這幾年來第一次有這樣的感受。

sentences.english: For years, the government has been buoying up cotton prices.
sentences.chinese: 多年來政府一直保持棉花高價格。

sentences.english: Gordimer's fiction has been the subject of much commentary in South Africa over the years.
sentences.chinese: 戈迪默的小說已多年來在南非引起了很大評論的話題。

sentences.english: Emerging Asia has grown by an annual average of 8% over the past three years—as fast as before the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 過去三年來以年均8%的速度增長着，和危機前一樣。

sentences.english: We had been doing business with each other for years before we quarrelled.
sentences.chinese: 在吵翻之前，我們多年來在業務上一直來往。

sentences.english: Muammar al-Qaddafi, making his first appearance despite 40 years in power.
sentences.chinese: 這也是卡扎菲執政40年來首次參加聯大會議。

sentences.english: Eg. For years he refused to associate with Stephenson's staff.
sentences.chinese: 多年來，他一直拒絕同史蒂芬森手下的人交往。

sentences.english: Over the past 10-plus years, the booming tourist industry has stimulated the Great wall's renovation project.
sentences.chinese: 十幾年來，蓬勃發展的旅遊業促進了長城的修繕工程。

sentences.english: China's rise has been on everyone's lips in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，國崛起成爲街談巷議的話題。

sentences.english: The Industrial cluster is a topic popularily concerned in the academic world either in our country or abroad in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 產業集羣是近年來國內外學術界關注的一個熱點話題。

sentences.english: Carmack said Id turned down many offers from large publishers over the years.
sentences.chinese: 卡馬克說號拒絕了許多優惠大出版商多年來。

sentences.english: Goldberg said researchers have been working with robots for 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 戈爾德貝爾格說研究人員50年來一直研究機器人。

sentences.english: So that was a more recent one.
sentences.chinese: 上面所說的是近年來遇到的挑戰。

sentences.english: For many years, he avoided lakes "ending."
sentences.chinese: 多年來，他迴避《笑傲江湖》的結局。

sentences.english: Hungarians have had the ambition of becoming the masters of the Central Plains for many years.
sentences.chinese: 北方的匈奴多年來一直有入主中原的野心。

sentences.english: The importance and vulnerability of seed banks have become apparent in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 種子銀行的重要性和脆弱性近幾年來已很明顯。
